item.title: Ideas for Making Healthy Desserts
Heartburn or Something More? How to Tell the Difference
13 Tips to Warm Up When You’re Always Cold
item.description: Feeling cold all the time? Try these habits that may help you stay warmer -- and learn when it may be helpful to check in with your doctor.

item.title: For Black women with breast cancer, ultra-processed foods may worsen health outcomes
item.description: A study by Rutgers Cancer Institute researchers is the first to link ultra-processed foods to reduced survival in Black women with breast cancer.
